Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_metrics_info
Description: Diagnostic of GDC centre identifier, API URL, and GB subscribed to

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_passed_total
Description: Number of metadata records passed validation

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_failed_total
Description: Number of metadata records failed validation

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_kpi_percentage_total
Description: KPI percentage for a single metadata record (metadata_id equals WCMP2 id)

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_kpi_percentage_over80_total
Description: Number of metadata records with KPI percentage over 80

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_search_total
Description: Number of search requests (during last monitoring period)

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_search_terms
Description: Most popular search terms (e.g. top=1 to top=5)

Name: wmo_wis2_gdc_connected_flag
Description: Connection status from GDC to to centre
